Healing

Healing refers to the restoration of health points (HP) for the hero or other characters in the dungeon.

Methods of Healing

  • Potions: Potion of Healing and other healing potions
  • Spells: Heal Spell and others
  • Items: Certain rings and artifacts provide healing over time
  • NPCs: Some NPCs may offer healing services
  • Passive: Some classes and subclasses have passive healing abilities

Healing Sources

  • Potion of Healing - Basic healing potion
  • Potion of Overhealing - Provides temporary health buffer
  • Ring of Mending - Provides gradual healing over time
  • Regeneration - Temporary buff that heals over time
  • Wand of Regrowth - Can be used for healing in some cases

Healing Mechanics

  • Healing cannot restore HP above the character's maximum HP
  • Some healing methods are more efficient than others
  • Healing can be interrupted by taking damage

  • Spells - List of spells including healing ones
